remove(int) - Method in class gametools.SpriteGroup
Removes the specified sprite from the group.
remove(Sprite) - Method in class gametools.SpriteGroup
Removes the specified sprite from the group.
removeAll(List<Sprite>) - Method in class gametools.SpriteGroup
Removes all the sprites from the group that match the ones passed in.
removeAllWithin(Area) - Method in class gametools.SpriteGroup
Removes all sprites that are colliding with the specified object.
removeAllWithin(Area, int) - Method in class gametools.SpriteGroup
Removes all sprites that are colliding with the specified object using a custom collision testing method.
removeSprites() - Method in class gametools.SpriteGroup
 
removeSprites(boolean) - Method in class gametools.SpriteGroup
 
removeWhenOffScreen() - Method in class gametools.SpriteGroup
Removes all sprites automatically as soon as they leave the screen.
rotate(Position, double) - Method in class gametools.Position
Rotates the point around the specified position.
RT_CLOCK_WISE - Static variable in class gametools.Sprite
Clockwise sprite rotation.
RT_COUNTER_CLOCK_WISE - Static variable in class gametools.Sprite
Counter-clockwise sprite rotation.
run() - Method in class gametools.Game
Method that updates at the specified FPS (the default is 60) that should contain most the main game code.
